text:

name: Time Bomb

text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nSacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
{R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Tinder Wall deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

name: Total War
text: Whenever a player attacks with one or more creatures, destroy all untapped non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack, except for creatures the player hasn't controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn.

name: Touch of Death
text: Touch of Death deals 1 damage to target player. You gain 1 life.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Veldt
text:
Veldt doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Veldt.

text: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

name: Vertigo

name: Vexing Arcanix
text: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to him or her.

name: Vibrating Sphere
text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.\nAs long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get -0/-2.

name: Walking Wall
text: Defender\n{3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only once each turn.

Whiteout

text:
Cast Winter's Chill only during combat before blockers are declared.\nX can't be greater than the number of snow lands you control.
Choose X target attacking creatures. For each of those creatures, its controller may pay {1} or {2}. If that player doesn't, destroy that creature at end of combat. If that player pays only {1}, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this combat.

text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Withering Wisps.\n{B}: Withering Wisps deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability no more times each turn than the number of snow Swamps you control.

name: Word of Blasting
text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

text: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.

text: Flying\n{G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.

name: Zur's Weirding
text: Players play with their hands revealed.\nIf a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
